div.style: display: flex; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-bottom: 4px
display: flex; align-items: flex-start; flex-direction: column; margin-right: 10px; line-height: 28px

label.style: position: relative; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; color: @Color_Black; font-size: 24px; line-height: 28px; align-self: flex-start
position: relative; margin-top: 1px; color: @Color_Hue170_H8; font-size: 22px; align-self: flex-start
